name: wpStockvault
author: Stephan Gerlach

sections.description:
With wpStockvault you can very easily display images from stockvault.net via shortcode.

There are various ways to customize the output which is described in the Guide that can be found in the Admin Menu
sections.installation:
1. Upload index.php to the /wp-content/plugins/wpstockvault directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

* or 1. Search for wpstockvault via Plugins – Add New in the admin area 2. Click on Install 3. Activate plugin
sections.faq:
What is stockvault.net

Stockvault.net is a website that has free to use images. These images are uploaded by various users.
sections.changelog:
1.1.2

  • fixed plugin version error

1.1.1

  • fixed small issue with donate button

1.1

  • Added Search and All latest images to the shortcode
  • changed menu from Stockvault to wpStockvault
  • added paypal donate button

1.0

  • Initial release
